item.description: This will be a fun night to end the work week and meet new people. They have delicious food to enjoy and a nice atmosphere. Come join us! To reserve, call Gail at 860-582-8229. Directions to 1489 Silas Deane Highway: I-91N to exit 24, at end of ramp look across the street, Dakotaâ€™s is behind On the Border Mexican Cantina.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside waiting for you.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!

item.name: Singles Dinner Evening
